remarks: Lemma for ~ 2sq .  Every factor of a "proper" sum of two squares (where the summands are coprime) is a sum of two squares.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2015.)
statement:
2sq.1 $e |- S = ran ( w e. Z[i] |-> ( ( abs ` w ) ^ 2 ) ) $.
2sqlem7.2 $e |- Y = { z | E. x e. ZZ E. y e. ZZ ( ( x gcd y ) = 1 /\ z = ( ( x ^ 2 ) + ( y ^ 2 ) ) ) } $.
2sqlem10 $p |- ( ( A e. Y /\ B e. NN /\ B || A ) -> B e. S ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y $.
$d S x y z $.
$d Y x y $.
$d w x y z $.
